snippet: The notice seeks to overturn regulations imposed by the state Motor Vehicle Commission that require new-car dealers to have franchise agreements before they can be licensed.
abstract: Electric car company Tesla Motors has filed notice that it intends to go to court to appeal New Jersey's ruling that would stop it from selling its vehicles in the state.
lead_paragraph: The notice seeks to overturn regulations imposed by the state Motor Vehicle Commission that require new-car dealers to have franchise agreements before they can be licensed.

headline.main: Tesla to Appeal a Ruling That Blocks New Jersey Sales
headline.print_headline: Tesla to Appeal a Ruling That Blocks New Jersey Sales
